## Twitter.cardType property

The card type, which will be one of `summary`<!-- -->, `summary_large_image`<!-- -->, `app`<!-- -->, or `player`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cardType?: LiteralUnion<TwitterCardType, string>;
```
